lead_paragraph: The Devils lost a third straight game in regulation for the first time since the start of the season.
snippet: The Devils lost a third straight game in regulation for the first time since the start of the season.

headline.main: Bruins Thrash Devils for Their 3,000th Victory
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefings | Hockey; Bruins Defeat the Devils

abstract: Boston Bruins beat New Jersey Devils, 4-1, for franchise's 3,000th win; other hockey news noted.
